operators.name: DefineEntities
operators.kern_template: rule DefineEntities: if has_entities_spec() then generate_entities_code()

operators.name: CreateRoutes
operators.kern_template: rule CreateRoutes: if has_route_spec() then generate_route_code()

operators.name: MultiModalCodeGeneration
operators.kern_template: rule MultiModalCodeGeneration: if has_specification() then generate_code_for_all_modalities()

operators.name: ImageGeneration
operators.kern_template: rule ImageGeneration: if has_description() then generate_image_from_description()

emissions.rust: // Image generation in Rust using image crate
emissions.python: # Image generation in Python using PIL
